title: Brunch Sweet Potato Pancakes
ingredients: ['250g peeled sweet potatoes', '3 tablespoons creme fraiche', '4 large eggs', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '75g self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon melted butter', 'Vegetable oil for frying']
